articles.author: Robert Pearlman
articles.title: NASA names 24th astronaut class, including prior SpaceX crew member - Ars Technica
articles.description: NASA has named its new class of astronaut candidates. The space agency introduced the four men and six women who comprise its 2025 trainee group.

articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: iFixit tears down the iPhone Air, finds that it’s mostly battery - Ars Technica
articles.description: Design that puts the logic board at the top helps stave off a second Bendgate.

articles.author: Aria Alamalhodaei
articles.title: Blue Origin wins NASA deal to ferry VIPER rover to lunar south pole - TechCrunch
articles.description: NASA's water-ice prospecting mission is getting a second life with Blue Origin.
articles.content:
On Friday, Blue Origin won a major NASA contract to deliver a lunar rover to the moon, a strong vote of confidence in both the Blue Moon lander and the future of human exploration.
The contract also… [+2169 chars]
